revised_title: Verification of the Proportionality between Radiation Pressure and Refractive Index
tldr: The authors conducted an experiment to verify the prediction that the normal pressure of radiation on a body is proportional to the refractive index of the medium in which the body is immersed. They used a metal vane mounted on a torsional suspension and measured the pressure on the vane in different liquids and air. The results confirmed the proportionality within experimental error, supporting the electromagnetic theory of light.
